data.comment: The match has started.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 4, Sao Paulo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Throw-in for Sao Paulo at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sao Paulo's Igor Vinicius breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 9, Sao Paulo's Brenner gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras's Wesley has run offside.
In the minute 11, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Luciano is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 20, Sao Paulo's Luciano looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Sao Paulo surge into the attack at Allianz Parque but Igor Gomesâ€™s header is off-target.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Throw-in Palmeiras.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Ball goes out of play for a Palmeiras goal kick.
In the minute 24, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Palmeiras are coming forward and Wesley gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 27, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Palmeiras.
Felipe Melo (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Patrick de Paula of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 32, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 34, Felipe Melo (Palmeiras) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Ball safe as Sao Paulo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 36, Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
Igor Vinicius (Sao Paulo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Tiago Volpi is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 39, Tiago Volpi returns to the field for Sao Paulo after picking up a slight injury.
In Sao Paulo Sao Paulo drive forward through Reinaldo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tche Tche (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 43, Sao Paulo attack but Luciano's header doesn't find the target.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Patrick de Paula's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 44, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Sao Paulo territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
The first-half is over at Allianz Parque.
The second half has started at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 47, Free kick Palmeiras.
At Allianz Parque, Igor Vinicius has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 48, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Sao Paulo throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Lucas Esteves for Palmeiras has been booked by Leandro Pedro Vuaden and receives a first yellow card.
Reinaldo for Sao Paulo drives towards goal at Allianz Parque. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Sao Paulo.
Brenner (Sao Paulo) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Palmeiras have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sao Paulo have been given a penalty...
Goal! Reinaldo gives Sao Paulo a 0-1 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In Sao Paulo, Wesley (Palmeiras) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 59, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras make their first substitution with Luiz Adriano replacing Willian.
Gustavo Scarpa is replacing Raphael Veiga for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 60, Vanderlei Luxemburgo is making the team's third substitution at Allianz Parque with Gabriel Veron replacing Wesley.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Allianz Parque.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
Gustavo Scarpa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Palmeiras.
In the minute 67, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Reinaldo of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Sao Paulo.
In the minute 70, Ramires is replacing Ze Rafael for the home team.
Danilo is on a sub for Lucas Esteves for Palmeiras.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 73, Sao Paulo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Palmeiras's area.
In Sao Paulo, Dani Alves of Sao Paulo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 75, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Palmeiras pushes forward through Gustavo Scarpa, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 77, Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Palmeiras's Patrick de Paula attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
In the minute 78, Free kick Palmeiras.
Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
The away team replace Igor Gomes with Jonas Toro.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Luciano with Vitor Bueno.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 83, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Sao Paulo.
The match at Allianz Parque has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gustavo Scarpa, who is down injured.
In the minute 86, Gustavo Scarpa has recovered and rejoins the match in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Patrick de Paula (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 86, Fernando Diniz (Sao Paulo) is making a third substitution, with Leo Pele replacing Tche Tche.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 89, Luan Garcia for Palmeiras is whistled offside.
Pablo Felipe is on a sub for Brenner for Sao Paulo.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Palmeiras needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Goal! Vitor Bueno extends Sao Paulo's lead to 0-2.
Great play from Igor Vinicius to set up the goal.
